identity.name: Edgar Colmenero
identity.descriptor: Product-minded Full-Stack Software Engineer focused on reliable client delivery.
identity.status: Early-career full-stack engineer available for opportunities

timeline.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer (Contract)
timeline.impact: Building and maintaining production web applications that support pricing updates, catalog management, and internal order workflows for a wholesale client.

timeline.title: Shift Manager
timeline.impact: Led floor operations, coordinated scheduling, and ensured consistent customer experience during high-traffic periods.

timeline.title: Bilingual Financial Services Representative
timeline.impact: Delivered English and Spanish customer support in a regulated environment, resolving complex account issues and documenting outcomes accurately.

timeline.title: Additional Leadership & Retail Experience
timeline.impact: Managed team coverage, trained associates on inventory systems, and maintained compliance standards while supporting high-volume customer needs.

projects.name: SwiftSend delivery portal
projects.description: Consulting engagement to refine courier assignment flows, add tracking views, and stabilize order processing for a delivery services startup.
projects.outcome: Improved reliability of dispatch tasks and clarified status visibility for operators.

projects.name: ShopRavis inventory & ordering
projects.description: Wholesale catalog and ordering interface with search, pricing updates, and basic analytics for Ravi’s Import Warehouse.
projects.outcome: Delivered a stable storefront and internal tools to reduce manual data entry.

projects.name: Realtor Demo Pro
projects.description: Front-end demo experience for real estate listings, featuring property search, map views, and lead capture forms.
projects.outcome: Showcased ability to translate product requirements into interactive UI with clean data flows.

projects.name: This resume site
projects.description: Data-driven personal site with Web Worker metrics, resilient loading, and structured resume data.
projects.outcome: Demonstrates thoughtful defaults, accessibility, and transparent skill representation.

projects.name: Inventory checklist automation
projects.description: Lightweight scripts to automate reconciliation of purchase orders and stock counts for small business clients.
projects.outcome: Reduced manual spreadsheet work and improved accuracy of weekly inventory reports.

projects.name: Client support knowledge base
projects.description: Single-page application for bilingual FAQs and guided workflows for customer service teams.
projects.outcome: Enabled faster responses and consistent documentation across English and Spanish teams.

projects.name: Shift scheduling dashboard
projects.description: Tool to visualize shift coverage, manage time-off requests, and surface staffing gaps for retail managers.
projects.outcome: Helped store leads adjust staffing based on peak hours and reduce overtime conflicts.

projects.name: Academic data analysis toolkit
projects.description: Course project exploring data cleaning, visualization, and statistical summaries for public datasets.
projects.outcome: Built confidence in analytical thinking and communicating findings with visuals.

projects.name: Accessibility-first UI components
projects.description: Set of reusable form and navigation components with keyboard and screen reader support.
projects.outcome: Improved usability of personal projects and ensured consistent patterns across pages.

projects.name: Portfolio content manager
projects.description: Simple CMS-style interface to manage project entries, tags, and media links for personal sites.
projects.outcome: Streamlined updates to project pages without manual HTML edits.

accomplishments: Shipped production full-stack features for real clients, translating requirements into reliable web applications.
Delivered bilingual customer support in finance, documenting regulated interactions accurately.
Led teams in retail settings, coordinating schedules and training associates on systems and processes.
Balanced academic work with engineering engagements, progressing from retail roles into full-stack development.

roadmap.summary: Deepening full-stack fundamentals, polishing portfolio projects, and applying to software engineering roles focused on client delivery.
Building larger systems with stronger backend depth, performance tuning, and better observability for automation flows.
Growing into senior ownership of scalable architectures, leading reliability efforts, and mentoring teams through delivery.
